name: Dark Side of Fate
description:
Dark side of Fate is a perfect 2D quest with hardcore elements where you have to resist ancient evil playing as a forester Noah.

Here you can do different kinds of craft from animals’ hunting to killing bloodthirsty monsters.

As you see, there is no definite plot in the game. You choose any thing you like – do various quests, research new locations, kill monsters. Doing the activities, you are closer and closer to the end of the game. Upgrade your character, sell the items, make money and buy the best equipment. Be really sure - the game will give you an unforgettable impression!
